name: Waste Wanderer Cardish
text: Even if he bombs, he's having a blast freelancing for E.V.I.L.

name: Dark Ritualist Zafarr
text: Likes his rituals like he likes his coffee: Dark. And twice-brewed.

name: Vera Ridley
text: Her lackeys aren't lacking when it comes to workplace benefits.

name: Nash the Greatworm
text: Rumor has it this is merely the other end of Gnosh the Greatworm.

name: Glack the Scorpid
text: Elise's journal entry for Glack simply says, "Don't get stung".

name: Mister Chu
text: Chu bravely volunteered to "guard" this treasure-filled tomb.

name: Squeamlish
text: She's mastered more terrifying forms. Like squirrel. And mushroom.

name: Sinkhole
text: The best way to avoid a sinkhole is to - oh, too late.

name: Demolisher 3V-11
text: Rafaam got a great deal on one of these at a Horde surplus auction.

name: Terraviss
text: Slithering into the tombs to snake a few spells and weapons.

name: R.O.B.O.L.D.
text: They rebuilt the Kobold Barbarian. Faster. Stronger. Flamier.

name: Pyramad
text: Earth. Air. Fire. Water...  Pyramid.

name: Snakeflinger Scalesnout
text: Snakes with pointed snouts are venomous. And the best ammo.

name: Sword Dancer Sirinell
text: It is said that sethrak sword dancers are the bane of kings.

name: Lt. Herring
text: Leads the dreaded E.V.I.L. Puffertroopers, AKA "The Flying Fish."

name: Battrund
text: Not all of Battrund's minions are mummies. Some got a bad wrap.

name: Ichabod the Cursed
text: These gnomes are cursed! And you, too, will curse them.

name: Twizzleflux
text: Twizzleflux is spreading the very curse that maligned him.

name: Sothis
text: This terrible titan watcher has his own personal army.

name: Kham
text: Now you see him, now you don't, now you're impaled.

name: Illidara Sunsdawn
text: The Reliquary is here, and their discoveries are bad news for you.

name: Colossus of the Sun
displayName: Boss met: Colossus of the Sun
text: This titan colossus abhors all weakness.
completedText: You met Colossus of the Sun

name: Skarik
text: This king cobra is also the King of Beasts.

name: Suspicious Palm Tree
text: This oasis would've been welcome if Hagatha hadn't gotten here first.

name: Beetle Herder Zenda
text: Beetle stampedes are terrifying. It's the rumble of those teeny-tiny feet.

name: Thudd Lockspring
text: Is it really a magical "wand" when it's got a trigger and full auto?

name: Ol' Toomba
text: Ol' Toomba the treasure hunter isn't above copying homework.

name: Sazin
text: With sand and fury the hot winds blow. Where did your minions go?

name: Ozara
text: Ozara of the sands believes that the Dust Devil is in the details.

name: Ermavar
text: The first of her name, Ermavar is revered as the waker of flame.

name: Pillager Drasar
text: Drasar generously shares stolen treasures with her minions.

name: Edra
text: The ancient lifewardens guard this sacred space with their life(steal).

name: Runaway Ruby
text: Gnomes put tank treads on a submarine for desert use. Because gnomes.

name: Dovo Fastfuse
text: Dovo's excavation methods put the "boom" in "tomb".

name: Earthrager Ptah
text: Avoid meeting Ptah's gaze. Or standing next to anyone who does.

name: Kasa Softspeaker
text: The Plague of Madness has not been kind to once-gentle Kasa.

name: Xatma, Plague Lord of Death
displayName: Boss met: Xatma, Plague Lord of Death
text: The third plague rests in final breath: You face the  ancient Lord of Death!
completedText: You met Xatma, Plague Lord of Death

name: Xatma, Plague Lord of Death
displayName: Boss met: Xatma, Plague Lord of Death
text: The third plague rests in final breath: You face the  ancient Lord of Death!
completedText: You met Xatma, Plague Lord of Death

displayName: Boss met: Xatma, Plague Lord of Death
text: The third plague rests in final breath: You face the  ancient Lord of Death!
completedText: You met Xatma, Plague Lord of Death

displayName: Boss met: K'zrath, Plague Lord of Madness
text: The second plague is in the brain: Among these dunes, Madness reigns.
completedText: You met K'zrath, Plague Lord of Madness

displayName: Boss met: K'zrath, Plague Lord of Madness
text: The second plague is in the brain: Among these dunes, Madness reigns.

displayName: Boss met: Vesh, Plague Lord of Murlocs
text: The first plague is a finful  pox: Beware, beware the Lord of 'Locs.
completedText: You met Vesh, Plague Lord of Murlocs

displayName: Boss met: Vesh, Plague Lord of Murlocs
text: The first plague is a finful  pox: Beware, beware the Lord of 'Locs.

displayName: Boss met: Vesh, Plague Lord of Murlocs
text: The first plague is a finful  pox: Beware, beware the Lord of 'Locs.
completedText: You met Vesh, Plague Lord of Murlocs

name: Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath
displayName: Boss met: Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath
text: The fourth plague roots within the heart: Wrath tears friend and foe apart.
completedText: You met Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath

name: Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath
displayName: Boss met: Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath
text: The fourth plague roots within the heart: Wrath tears friend and foe apart.
completedText: You met Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath

name: Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath
displayName: Boss met: Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath
text: The fourth plague roots within the heart: Wrath tears friend and foe apart.
completedText: You met Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath

name: Alda Petrik
text: Alda's learned some tricks. Like sit. Stay. Loot. Summon beasts.

name: Sandshaper Rhogi
text: Rhogi is a sand conjurer. He copies minions. And makes a mean castle.

name: Jolene Knottley
text: Jolene's writing is absolute madness. Her grammar is worse.

name: Trap Room
text: Reno is especially good at detecting traps. With his face.

name: Belloc Brightblade
text: This smarmy leader of the Reliquary is a thief of the highest order.

name: Wildtooth
text: "Sand sharks aren't real" according to a half-eaten journal.

name: Totally Normal Jar
text: You should be wary when treasures walk right up to you.

name: Ilza Grimdrum
text: Ilza is an arena champion known as 'The Cruel Dueler.'

name: Craz
text: This belong to Craz! Go away, or Craz will bring his tiny friends!

name: Ol' Barkeye
text: Frustrated with just a rifle, Ol' Barkeye has taken up the blade.

name: Kasmut
text: This anubisath over-achiever prefers to re-raise the extra dead.

name: Lich Baz'hial
text: Baz'hial has cheated death. She also cheats at cards.

name: Taskmaster Maru
text: This agent of E.V.I.L. is never lacking for lackeys.

name: Janak
text: This scheming hozen heads up E.V.I.L.'s desert cavalry.

name: Water-Toting Murlocs
text: Years of experience tell you not to ignore this terrible threat.

name: Sand Puffer Frog
text: One puff's enough to bluff a minion's stuff.

name: Winged Guardian
text: This great beast's roar bolsters allies and terrifies its foes.

name: Jythiros of Questions
text: A riddle... within a mystery...in an enigma...  with a funny head.

name: Dire Bat
text: They wouldn't be a problem if you just stopped feeding them.

name: Zaraam
text: Zaraam grows in strength the more his minions suffer.

name: Kyriss
text: Line up all your minions. It'll be hilarious.

name: A Beautiful Oasis
text: Merciful shade. Fresh cool water. A perfectly balanced meta. Is it real?

name: Vessina
text: If impatience is an E.V.I.L. virtue, Vessina must be a saint.

name: Thrud
text: And some people think rogues need to be sneaky.

name: Siamat
text: The South Winds (usually) bring exactly what Siamat wanted.

name: Tekahn, Plague Lord of Flame
displayName: Boss met: Tekahn, Plague Lord of Flame
text: The fifth plague, Tekhan laid claim: behold the mighty Lord of Flame!
completedText: You met Tekahn, Plague Lord of Flame

name: Weaponized Wasp
text: Unlike bees, wasps can keep stinging you. With a laser.

name: Isiset
text: In the deft hands of the Mistress of Magic, any spell can be a Twinspell.

name: Rajh
text: The mighty Lord of the Sun shines brightest when casting spells.

name: Ammunae
text: Every party needs a healer. And nobody partied like the titans.

name: Setesh
text: Setesh curses minions... Without even getting to know them first.

name: General Husam
text: Those who serve under General Husam are in a rush to leave.

name: High Prophet Barim
text: Barim “prophets” from the misfortune of others.

name: Avozu
text: Avozu the Hunter will stop at nothing until his prey is subdued.

name: Tarkus
text: Violence begets violence. Tarkus begets a whole lot.

name: Gorebite
text: If it opens its mouth, you should run. Double-time.

name: Octosari
text: His favorite number is 7. Disrupt its perfection at your own peril!

name: Armadillobot
text: Is it insane to let a critter pilot a mech? Dr. Boom thinks not.

name: Waste Wanderer Cardish
text: Even if he bombs, he's having a blast freelancing for E.V.I.L.

text: His favorite number is 7. Disrupt its perfection at your own peril!

name: Armadillobot
text: Is it insane to let a critter pilot a mech? Dr. Boom thinks not.

name: Mummy Magic
text: After you play a Deathrattle minion, give it Reborn.

name: Crook and Flail
displayName: Passive ability triggered: Crook and Flail
text: After you cast a spell, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.

name: Unlocked Potential
text: At the start of the game, set the Attack of each of your minions equal to its Health.

name: VIP Membership
text: Taverns you visit are upgraded!

name: Disks of Legend
displayName: Passive ability triggered: Disks of Legend
text: After you play a Legendary minion, summon a copy of it.

name: Darklight Torch
text: After you play an even-Cost card, refresh your hero power. It costs (0) this turn.

name: Primordial Bulwark
text: Block lethal damage and deal 20 damage to the enemy hero (once per game).

name: Band of Bees
displayName: Passive ability triggered: Band of Bees
text: Your minions that cost (2) or less have Poisonous.

name: Band of Scarabs
displayName: Passive ability triggered: Band of Scarabs
text: Enemy minions have -1 Attack.

name: Disks of Swiftness
displayName: Passive ability triggered: Disks of Swiftness
text: Your opponent must pass their first 2 turns.

name: Alchemist's Stone
text: After you play an odd-Cost card, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).

name: Ever-Changing Elixir
text: At the end of your turn, transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.

name: Scroll of Nonsense
displayName: Passive ability triggered: Scroll of Nonsense
text: Spell Damage +10. At the end of your turn, this loses 1 Spell Damage.

name: Lucky Spade
text: After you Discover a card, add 2 copies of it to your hand. They all cost (2) less.

name: Titanic Ring
text: Your minions have +1 Health and Taunt.

name: Robes of Diminishing
displayName: Passive ability triggered: Robes of Diminishing
text: After you draw a spell, reduce its Cost to (0) this turn.

name: Amakir the Light
text: After this minion attacks, add 2 random healing spells to your hand. They cost (0).

name: Flo Slatebrand
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Treasure to your hand.

name: Addarah
text: Battlecry: Shuffle all enemy minions into your deck.

name: Canopic Jars
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random Legendary minion."

name: Book of the Dead
displayName: Treasure played: Book of the Dead
text: Deal 7 damage to all enemies. Costs (1) less for each minion that's died this game.
completedText: You played Book of the Dead

name: Staff of Scales
text: Summon three 1/1 Snakes with Rush, Poisonous and Reborn.

name: Ancient Snake
text: Rush Poisonous Reborn

name: Scales of Justice
text: Transform all minions into 1/1 Murlocs. Fill your hand with random Murlocs that cost (0).

name: Stone Fox Statue
text: Choose a minion and add 2 copies of it to your hand that cost (0).

name: Zephrys's Lamp
text: Start of Game: Draw this. Wish for the perfect card.

name: Jr. Scout
text: Charge. Windfury. At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.

name: Jr. Tomb Diver
text: Battlecry: If you played 6 Secrets this game, your Hero Power becomes 'Discover a Treasure'.

name: Jr. Navigator
text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, add 2 copies of the spell to your hand.

name: Jr. Excavator
text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards. Any minions you draw cost (2) less.

name: Pack Mule
text: Reduce the Cost of your 10 starter cards by (1).

name: Sr. Scout
text: Charge. Windfury. At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to a random enemy minion.

name: Sr. Tomb Diver
text: Battlecry: If you played 3 Secrets this game, your Hero Power becomes 'Discover a Treasure'.

name: Sr. Navigator
text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, add 2 copies of the spell to your hand.

name: Sr. Excavator
text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards. Any minions you draw cost (5) less.

name: Upgraded Pack Mule
text: Reduce the Cost of all cards in your deck by (1).

name: Enflamed Golem
text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions and summon a Sanctum Golem.

name: Rakanishu
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.

name: Runaway Gyrocopter
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to all enemy minions, then shuffle this into your deck.

name: Mystical Mirage
text: Twinspell Refresh your Mana Crystals and get a new hand this turn.

name: LOCUUUUSTS!!!
text: Twinspell. Choose an enemy. Fill your board with 2/2 Locusts that attack it.

name: Sack of Lamps
text: Start of Game: Draw this. Fill your hand with Zephrys's Lamps.

name: Staff of Ammunae
text: Twinspell. Your minions have Windfury and Immune this turn.

name: Phaoris' Blade
text: Windfury. After your hero attacks and kills a minion, this gains +2/+1.

name: Blade of the Burning Sun
displayName: Treasure played: Blade of the Burning Sun
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your deck +2 Attack. Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.
completedText: You played Blade of the Burning Sun

name: Primordial Bulwark
text: Secret: Block fatal damage and deal 20 damage to the enemy hero (can trigger on your turn).

name: Crawling Claw
text: Rush. Reborn. Deathrattle: Steal a card from your opponent's hand.

name: Hearthstone
text: Start of Game: Draw this. Escape to the Tavern and remove this from your Adventure deck.

name: Bob's Bouncer
text: Choose a minion and then cast 'Brawl.' If that minion survives, fill your board with copies of it.

name: Crusty the Crustacean
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Gain double its Attack and Health.

name: Aegis of Death
text: Your hero is Immune. Each turn, lose 1 Durabilty. Deathrattle: Deal 100 damage to your hero.

name: "Gnomebliterator"
text: Deal 10 damage. Also deal 10 damage to the Plague Lord when you fight it.

name: Flex-plosion
text: Blow up half your opponent's stuff.

name: Reno's Crafty Lasso
text: After your hero attacks, steal a card from your opponent's hand.

name: Kodo Hide Whip
text: After your hero attacks a minion and it survives, put that minion in your hand.

name: Reno's Lucky Hat
text: Give a minion +2/+2 and Spell Damage +2.

name: Reno's Magical Torch
text: Deal

name: Lei Flamepaw
text: After you cast a spell, cast it again (on the same target).

name: The Gatling Wand
text: Deal

name: Map of Uldum
text: Discover a card and gain a Mana Crystal for each Boss you've defeated this run.

name: Academic Research
text: Start of Game: Draw this. Gain

name: Starseeker's Tools
text: Discover a minion and a spell. They cost (2) less.

name: Staff of Renewal
text: Resurrect 7 friendly minions with the highest Cost. Give them Taunt.

name: Elise's Machete
text: After your hero attacks, summon two 2/2 Treants. Give them Rush.

name: Stolen Titan Secrets
text: Copy the Boss's Hero Power for the rest of this run.

name: Bauble of Beetles
text: Twinspell. Resurrect the first 4 friendly minions that died this game. Give them Reborn.

name: Ol' Faithful
text: After your hero attacks, deal 1 damage to all enemies.

name: Brann's Saddle
text: Give a friendly Beast +3/+3 and "Deathrattle: Give Brann's Saddle to another friendly Beast."

name: Ancient Reflections
text: Choose a minion. Fill your board with 1/1 copies of it.

name: Titan-Forged Grapnel
text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Gain Armor equal to their combined attack.

name: Brann's Epic Egg
text: After this takes damage, summon King Krush.

name: Murky's Battle Horn
text: Summon 7 Murlocs and give them Rush. At the start of your next turn, do it again.

name: Tracking Device
text: Start of Game: Draw this. Draw a 2, 3, 4, and 5-Cost card from your deck.

name: Maxwell, Mighty Steed
text: Rush. Reborn. Has +2 Attack for each other minion on the battlefield.

name: Finley's Pith Helmet
text: Give all friendly minions +2 Health. Shuffle this card into your deck.

name: Advanced Targeting Monocle
text: Cast a copy of all spells in your deck (targets chosen randomly).

name: Tea Time
text: Gain 4 Mana Crystals and draw 2 extra cards for the next boss only.

name: Truesilver Lance
text: Lifesteal After you Overload, gain +2 Durability.

name: Karl the Lost
text: Battlecry: Summon six 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits and give all friendly minions Taunt and Divine Shield.

name: Hiring Replacements
text: Choose a friendly minion. Discover a minion to replace it in your  Adventure Deck.

name: Study Break
text: Discover a spell. Add it to your Adventure deck. It always starts in your hand.

name: Friendly Smith
text: Discover a weapon  from any class. Add it  to your Adventure Deck  with +2/+2.

name: Party of Four
text: Discover a minion. Replace enemy minions with minions of that type.

name: Fast Food
text: Add all enemy minions to your Adventure Deck. They cost (1) less.

name: Work, Work!
text: Remove a friendly minion from your Adventure Deck. Give adjacent minions  +2/+2.

name: House Special
text: Replace your Adventure Deck with one of Bob's Bombastic Decks.

name: Do the Math
text: Remove all cards from your Adventure deck that cost (2) or less.
